availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Thomas (Ohio County, Kentucky, saddler apprentice.)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, saddler apprentice. Kentucky native. Son of David Thomas and Mary Thomas. Resident of Ohio County, Kentucky, in 1850. Saddler apprentice in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, District 1, p. 45A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio, Hartford, p. 788.
"John Christopher Thomas (1842-1926)," Find A Grave, Memorial 125830357, accessed November 2, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/125830357.
